comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: This man is most likely Pte 10311 John Ralph Apperly. www.awm.gov.au/research/people/nominal_rolls/first_world_... He was born in 1892 in Victoria and was the son of William Bermon Apperly and Pauline Mary Longstaffe. He survived the war and in 1924 was living in St Kilda East, Balaclava, Victoria according to electoral rolls. By 1931 he had moved to Camberwell, Kooyong, Victoria. He died 12 Mar 1936 in South Australia.
